During the night I have been holding communion with God. I was brought by my guide into councils in Battle Creek. I have a message for 


                                     -453- 

them, whether they will hear or reject. The people must know that they are not moving in the order of God. They have been arranging to leave Christ out of their councils. These men are giving a mold to the work that will result in the loss of many souls. They lead away from safe paths.
